gw.api.contact

Class ContactRetireContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.contact.ContactRetireContext

  • public class ContactRetireContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to manage the context for retiring a contact, contains:
    • Set of beans that can be retired as part of retiring this contact
    • Set of beans that have already been visited as part of checking if the contact can be retired
    • Bundle in which to load any beans
    It is used as a parameter for the ContactRetireBean#computeCanRetireContact method

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContactRetireContext()
      Creates a new context for a contact retire operation.
